headline: Is MSCI Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Weakness in 2025?
summary: If you have been wondering whether MSCI is a bargain or just an expensive quality name, you are not alone. This stock sits at the crossroads of premium pricing and long term growth potential. Despite a solid long term gain of 32.5% over five years, MSCI is down 12.5% over the last year, 8.0% year to date, and 6.0% over the past month, with only a modest 1.6% uptick in the last week hinting that sentiment might be stabilizing. Recently, markets have been reacting to shifting expectations...

headline: Huge Insider Buying in MGM and Salesforce
summary: As the year winds down, insiders make huge buys in MGM Resorts and Salesforce. However, those were not the only notable instances of insider buying seen recently.

headline: Is MSCI’s New Public–Private Index and Crypto Stance Altering The Investment Case For MSCI (MSCI)?
summary: Earlier this month, MSCI Inc. launched the MSCI All Country Public + Private Equity Index, a daily index blending MSCI ACWI IMI with a modeled private equity component targeting a 15% allocation, while also facing industry pushback over its proposal to exclude companies with substantial crypto treasuries from its benchmarks. The combination of a new public–private equity benchmark built on data from nearly 10,000 private equity funds and a contentious crypto index policy puts MSCI at the...
